hiveArticle.title: Daily Steem Stats Report - July 07, 2017
hiveArticle.body:
Welcome to my Steem Stats Report for Friday, July 07, 2017. All data is coming directly from the Steem blockchain and is based on UTC time.

Only 384 new accounts yesterday. Hopefully we will see a lot of new accounts again as soon as [Hardfork 20](https://steemit.com/steemit/@steemitblog/proposing-hardfork-0-20-0-velocity) kicks in.

 > The focus of Hardfork 20 is on improving the process of account creation and reducing the friction involved in onboarding millions of new users.

*More info: https://steemit.com/steemit/@steemitblog/proposing-hardfork-0-20-0-velocity*
